alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 6:55AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: There may be local dense fog or freezing fog, especially over the higher terrain, where a low stratus deck meets the terrain. Most areas will not have dense fog or freezing fog. If you are traveling, use caution in case visibilities suddenly drop in dense fog or freezing fog. Also, where temperatures are below freezing, roadways may be slick due to freezing rain, refrozen melted snow or from the freezing fog itself. Conditions will improve later this morning and afternoon as temperatures rise above freezing.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon
